description: Boeing's new 787 Dreamliner caught on fire yesterday after landing in Boston. No passengers were injured, but the verdict is still out on the injuries Boeing might suffer. How big is the 'marriage penalty' in the new fiscal cliff deal? And Financial Times columnist Lucy Kellaway shares her annual list of businesses behaving badly.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, January 8, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, January 8, 2013
byline: Karen Clark, Sam Beard, Jeremy Hobson, Jeff Tyler, Martin Patience, Mitchell Hartman, Eve Troeh, Jeff Horwich and Queena Kim
teaser: Boeing's new 787 Dreamliner caught on fire yesterday after landing in Boston. No passengers were injured, but the verdict is still out on the injuries Boeing might suffer. How big is the 'marriage penalty' in the new fiscal cliff deal? And Financial Times columnist Lucy Kellaway shares her annual list of businesses behaving badly.
